title: US Junior Champion Samantha Scott Steps into Pro Peloton with Move to Lotto-Dstny
content:
18-year-old talent joins Lotto-Dstny Ladies after winning US road and TT titles in blockbuster 2023 season.

Read the full article at US Junior Champion Samantha Scott Steps into Pro Peloton with Move to Lotto-Dstny on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
